titles.title: Silver Cliff Community Act
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Silver Cliff, Colorado, and for other purposes.
Silver Cliff Community Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Silver Cliff Community Act
This bill directs the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Silver Cliff, Colorado.
